title: Bronze Cafe at The Center
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened spring 2013, the cafe makes its food from scratch (except for pita and whole wheat bread) and offers many marked vegan items, including: a tree of life pita sandwich and a good earth pita sandwich, both of which come with a side salad; various sides and salads; option to add house-made seitan to sandwich or salad; house-made raw almond mylk; and has soymilk and blended smoothies.
